GSD.product_version: versions from v5.13 to before v5.15.61
GSD.description:
locking/csd_lock: Change csdlock_debug from early_param to __setup

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit d2cbdbe22b5f190055d2d0ae92e7454479343a30, it was introduced in version v5.13 by commit 8d0968cc6b8ffd8496c2ebffdfdc801f949a85e5. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: locking/csd_lock: Change csdlock_debug from early_param to __setup
OSV.details:
